node.description: set continuous local L1A (setup with register 0x1c)
sends event number reset thru TTC when in local L1A mode
sends orbit number reset thru TTC when in local L1A mode
HCAL Trigger test mode catch BC0
HCAL Trigger test mode sample input
SDRAM increment page number by 1 in run mode
general reset (ddr3 memory controller not included)
Send single command if enabled by bit 30 in reg 0x24-0x27
AMC set BC0 compensation, default to 0x18
scale factor( = contents + 1). Note: if bit 18 is set to '1', these bits are ignored.
Disable corresponding AMCs TTS input signal
if '1'', TTC BC0 command works only once after reset
Enable calibration events in orbit gap (HCAL), default '1'
read only entire lower window limit
settable part of calibration window lower limit,3456 minimum(not included), default to '011101'
read only entire upper window limit
settable part of calibration window upper limit,3519 maximum(included), default to '100110'
if '1', pauses event building. For debugging only
if '1', TTS output is 80MHz clock which can be looped back to TTC input
if '0', memory test uses 64bit PRBS. If '1', uses 32 bit sequencial numbers.
if '1', TTS test mode (outputs from TTS_TEST_PATTERN)
If set to '1', bit 22-19 determine which events will be saved
If '1', overwrite old events in monitor buffer when full
if '1', monitor buffer full will stop event builder
Value n=0..15, save events with EvN low (20-n) bits '0'
scale factor( = contents + 1). Note: if bit 18 is set to '1', these bits are ignored.
If '1', stop monitor buffer write on AMC CRC error
CMS Source ID for SFP0 output data
CMS Source ID for SFP1 output data
CMS Source ID for SFP2 output data
CMS Source ID for output data
if '1', generate fake event upon receiving L1A
Beginning of orbit gap; triggers excluded
End of orbit gap; triggers excluded
Local L1A burst length (N+1) so =0 means 1 L1A
Local L1A rate. L1A every N+1 orbits@BcN=0x1f4, N+1 BX or 2*N's random
Local L1A trig rules: 0=all, 1=all but rule 4, 2=rules 1+2, 3=only rule 1

Short or long TTC command for BGO channel 0
'1' for long command on BGO channel 0

'1' for long command on BGO channel 3

Ignore '1' bits when comparing resync TTC command
If '1', accept triggers from T3 (ENABLE_INTERNAL_L1A must also be '1')
